headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

apiKey.title: Govee API Key
apiKey.description: The API key linked to your Govee account. You can obtain this using this guide.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If enabled, more information will be added to the log.

debugReqRes.title: Request & Response Logging
debugReqRes.description: If enabled, HTTP messages will be added to the log. Not recommended for long-term use.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If checked, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

refreshTime.title: Refresh Timer
refreshTime.description: An interval (in seconds) in which your devices will refresh with Govee.

layout.title: Required Settings
layout.description: These are the basic settings that are required for this plugin to work.

layout.title: Optional Settings
layout.description: A variety of optional settings for general use of this plugin.
